content.text: Not much, just got accepted to participate in Comic Con.
Oh that's awesome! I love Comic Con! I used to go every year but I just don't have the time anymore with my kids.
Yeah I can imagine it can be tough to find time with kids.
For sure. But I'm happy to hear you're going. Have you been before?
No, this is my first time. I'm really excited!
Oh you're going to have a blast! It's so much fun.
I'm sure it will be. I'm looking forward to it.
What are you most excited about?
I'm not sure. There's so much to do! I think I'm most excited about seeing all the different vendors and artists.
That's a great choice. There are so many amazing vendors and artists at Comic Con.
Yeah I've heard. I'm also excited to meet some of my favorite actors and actresses.
Oh that's awesome! I've never met any of my favorite actors or actresses but I've heard it's amazing.
Yeah it's definitely on my bucket list.
Well I hope you have a great time at Comic Con!
